extendedInfo.description: Get the latest celebrity gossip on your Android phone.Celebrity GossApp is the best way to keep up to date with  celebrity news. The best celebrity newspapers and magazines are all optimized for your phone: Perez Hilton, TMZ, People  and more.Read the truth about celeb romances, Hollywood weddings, what it's like to be on a reality show, celebs with anger management issues, celeb account hacking, movie releases, famous quotes, fashion show shocking stories, star dating information, celebrity babies, star break ups, star drug addiction, Hollywood child rearing disasters, star makeup,lifestyle, movie ratings, album releases, fresh movie trailers, Celebrity Tattoo, celebrity moms, single parents and celebrity baby bumps.- Easy to use interface- Entertainment for hours- Up to date celebrity info and news.LIKE the story you have read? Press menu and tap on SHARE button to share the story via email or message!Websites include:- Perez Hilton- Bravo TV website: Follow your favorite Housewives!- NY Post- US Magazine- PopEater- Huffington Post- PopSugar- RadarOnline- OMG! Yahoo- National Enquirer- WonderWall- Star Pulse- Gawker- E! Online- The Superficial- The Hollywood Gossip- Zap2It- Just Jared- Oh No They Didn't!- Project Runway's Blog- Celebrity-Gossip.net- Lainey Gossip- Evil Beet Gossip- Elle Magazine Cover Shot Celebrities added- Shape Magazine Celebrities- GQ Magazine Celebrities- Cosmopolitan Magazine Celebrities- Glamour Cover Shot Celebrities- Vanity FairUK websites - The Daily Mail - The Guardian- Telegraph- The Daily Mirror- The SunIf you don't know the answers to these questions or want more info, download Celeb GossApp now and never miss anything Celebrity related!!!Thanks for your support! Please email me if you have problems or want more features.  luvangy2000@yahoo.comLegal DisclaimerAll brands, logos, products, names, descriptions, characters, locations, imagery and video content are copyright to their respective owners and usage for this App falls within fair use guidelines.

reviews.title: U RUIND A PERFECT APP WITH ALL THEM \"GIANT\" ADS I GIVE MINUS 5
reviews.comment: I CANT BELIEVE WAT U WENT AN DONE TO MY FAV GOSS THIS APP WAS MY GOSS WORLD IT INTERDUCD ME TO SO MANY MOR SITES I NEVR HEARD OFI WAS ONLY USING EONLINE,TMZ,NATIONAL ENQUIR, IF I WANT TO NO ANTHING IN THE WORLD U NAME IT THIS APP PRETTY MUCH HAD IT I WAS WITHOUT MY FONE QUITE AWHILE BUT AS SOON AS I GOT ONE I HURRYD UP AN INSTALLD THIS APP THIS MADE GOSSIP EVN JUICIR MOR INTERESTD BUT WEN I OPEND THE APP AFTR ALL THIS TIME U GUYS MURDERED IT WITH ALL THE ADS U GOT NOW SOM HAV 3 to 4 PER PAGE IM UNINSTALLIN
reviews.author: Joleen Smith

reviews.title: BOOOOO
reviews.comment: New update redirects the page I\'m viewing to the Google Play Store-SUPER LAME

reviews.title: Seems more like Spam to me
reviews.comment: I used to like getting all the gossip from this application, until I found that it was spamming my homescreen and adding apps to the homepage when I didn\'t even download them yet. No good if that gets fixed ill gladly re dl please fix :(
reviews.author: Erica Young

reviews.title: Omg so painful!
reviews.comment: takes forever to load, when you rotate to see a picture it resets back to the home page, there\'s no \'next picture\' links where there should be. Just a really slow, poor app, I\'d rather not know! Forget this, Uninstall!
reviews.author: Kera Sage
